medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressively worsened left lower quadrant (LLQ) pain for the past 36 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began approximately 36 hours prior to admission and has progressively worsened. The patient reports some nausea but no vomiting, with the pain aggravated by eating and somewhat relieved by bowel movements. Bowel movements have been normal. The patient has never experienced similar symptoms before, and he reports feeling flushed.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Prostate cancer status post radiation therapy, hypertension, history of left inguinal hernia repair.
